Sangha

Korean: 상하

Group (2023-present):
NOMAD

Introduction

Sangha is a South Korean singer under NOMAD Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group NOMAD. He is best known for participating in the reality survival show Wild Idol.

On August 10, 2021, Sangha was introduced as the 18th contestant of Wild Idol but was eliminated in the third episode. Despite this setback, on December 15, 2023, he was announced as a member of NOMAD, with the EP "Nomad".
